attributes.action: Ensure that all goods sold in the UK have a grading system logo showing the ethical standards of its production and associated environmental impact.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ensure that customers can no longer deny that they are aware of the impact their purchases have on the environment and the community which produces them.  Some simple and unambiguous measures could be introduced such as the number of miles the product has travelled before sale. The grading system could be monitored by a range of ethical and environmental organisations.
